last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hanzawa has finally found the man, which can only mean one thing; it's murder time! But then, a certain master thief shows up.

name: Case Closed: The Culprit Hanzawa
original_name: 名探偵コナン 犯人の犯沢さん
overview: A silhouetted suspect moves to the crime-infested town of Beika with murder in mind, in this spinoff spoof of "Detective Conan."

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The first thing Hanzawa needs to do is find an apartment to live in, but it's almost impossible to find one where a murder hasn't taken place.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Hanzawa moves into a very nice apartment and becomes fast friends with a fellow resident. But then, a murder takes place.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Hanzawa heads to the town hall to run some errands, but must also make a pit stop in enemy territory — the local police station.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: It's an emergency: Hanzawa starts taking a nice morning shower, only to realizes that there's no shampoo in the bathroom.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After waking up in a cold sweat from a nightmare, Hanzawa makes a terrible decision and goes out into the dangerous streets of Beika at night.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Hanzawa needs a job fast, but the only work available is risky, scary, and probably illegal. But desperate times call for desperate measures.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Finally, Hanzawa gets a job at a new video rental shop. But then, the manager gets murdered — and all eyes turn to Hanzawa!?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: While stopping by a pet shop, Hanzawa has a fateful meeting with an impossibly cute, fluffy and very, very expensive Pomeranian.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: In an effort to look cool, Hanzawa goes out in search of some fashionable clothes. But watch out; in this town, the wrong outfit can get you killed.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Hanzawa’s mother comes to check out Beika — but then a hostage incident occurs, and she might be one of the victims!?

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: It's been a few months since moving to Beika, and Hanzawa hasn't gotten any closer to murdering that certain man.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Hanzawa has finally found the man, which can only mean one thing; it's murder time! But then, a certain master thief shows up.
